channel.title: Py Humble Books
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle Books bundles!

item.title: Traveller by Mongoose Publishing
item.content:encoded: Set out on a journey into the unknown in Traveller, the science fiction role-playing game of the far future! This starfarers’ bundle features over a dozen digital rulebooks, sourcebooks, and character & campaign resources for the latest edition of the iconic tabletop RPG. Plunder the galaxy in the Pirates of Drinax campaign and Drinaxian Companion, expanding the setting with new possibilities for adventure. Gear up with weapons and equipment using the Central Supply Catalogue and Field Catalogue. Get everything you need to craft and play your own sci-fi saga, and help support Cancer Research UK with your purchase!

item.title: CompTIA and Cisco Cert Prep by Packt
item.content:encoded: Learn the knowledge you need to get certified in CompTIA and Cisco with this bundle of ebooks from Packt. Featuring exam guides and practice tests for cert in CyberOps, implementing and administering Cisco solutions, CompTIA Security+, and much more, this bundle will help IT professionals take the next step in their career. Study up, and help support charity: water with your purchase!

item.title: Tad Williams: Osten Ard, Otherland, and Beyond
item.description: Experience the vast world of Tad Williams
item.content:encoded:
Get lost in the boundless imagination of best-selling science fiction and fantasy author Tad Williams with this vast collection of novels. Techno-thriller City of Golden Shadow is your intro to the harrowing Otherland series, where vast conspiracies harness wondrous VR worlds for wicked ends. Journey into Williams’ beloved fantasy world of Osten Ard—praised by the likes of George R. R. Martin and Patrick Rothfuss—with the The Witchwood Crown. Dive into these and other series from Williams (including Shadowmarch and Bobby Dollar), and support National Coalition Against Censorship with your purchase!

The titles in this bundle are available through Kobo.com. To access the content, create or log in to your Kobo.com account.

item.title: Bethesda 3D Printables and TTRPGs Feat. Elder Scrolls
item.description: The Elder Scrolls, Dishonored, and Fallout tabletop adventures
item.content:encoded: Explore the realms of Tamriel, the Empire of the Isles, and the wastelands of America with this bundle of tabletop role-playing & war-gaming ebooks and 3D printables! This bundle featuring Bethesda’s popular fantasy and sci-fi universes features rulebooks and more resources for Fallout: The Roleplaying Game & Wasteland Warfare, The Elder Scrolls: Call to Arms, and Dishonored, plus a cache of 3D print-at-home files to bring your wastelands and tombs to life. Experience your favorite universes in a whole new dimension, and help support International Rescue Committee with your purchase!

item.title: DevOps 2023 by O'Reilly
item.description: Your software development & operations reference library
item.content:encoded: Expand your DevOps skills and solve a range of engineering & IT issues with this bundle of books from O’Reilly. Learn how to harness service mesh technology in Consul: Up and Running. Discover best practices for managing reliable and sustainable systems in Modern System Administration. Tap into the collected wisdom of 97 Things Every IT Professional Should Know and more, and help support Code for America.

item.title: Pamper Your Pets
item.description: Learn more about your beloved pet friends!
item.content:encoded: There are few things people love more than their pets—and this bundle of animal-care books is a great collection of references and guides for current pet keepers or anyone looking to brighten up their world with a new companion. From training to diet to care to history and evolution, this bundle was made to tell you everything you’d ever want to know about cats and dogs. Get Home Cooking for Your Dog, The Original Dog Bible, The Total Cat Manual, When Cats Reigned Like Kings, are dozens more, and help support the World Wildlife Fund!

item.title: Thanks for Coming to My TED Talk by TED Books
item.description: Treat yourself to new ideas and inspiration
item.content:encoded: Revitalize your perspectives on tranquility, emotional healing, motivation, and more with this curated bundle from TED Books and Simon & Schuster. Learn how to cherish serenity and seek inner peace with Art of Stillness. Get guidance on overcoming heartache and loss in How to Fix a Broken Heart. Delve into the intricacies of human motivation in Payoff. Uncover a wealth of wisdom and wonder in this 24-ebook bundle, valued at over $200, and support the mission of Worldreader with your purchase!

item.title: Cloud Ops and Development by BPB
item.content:encoded: Elevate your cloud expertise with this comprehensive ebook bundle from BPB Publications! Uncover the secrets of container management and boost your employability with Kubernetes for Jobseekers. Refine your admin skills with the Linux Server Cookbook. Get a full-spectrum rundown on a critical suite of tools with Google Cloud Platform All-In-One Guide. Pay what you want for all these and over 30 more titles, and help support Covenant House with your purchase!

item.title: Game Design and Puzzlecraft 2023 by Lone Shark Games
item.content:encoded:
Hone your board game and puzzle design acumen with this ebook bundle packed with wisdom from the minds behind some of the world’s most revered games! Puzzlecraft will provide you a profound understanding of this fascinating discipline, along with step-by-step instructions to create your own conundrums. In Think Like a Game Designer, you’ll get expert guidance on the steps required to turn your passion into a viable career. With Mindspaces, you’ll dive into a handcrafted collection of crossword puzzles designed as therapeutic exercises, along with a series of essays to draw out your creativity.

Pay what you want for these and over 20 other ebooks from Lone Shark Games and more great publishers, and support Active Minds!

Active Minds is grateful for Humble Bundle's support of our organization's important mental health mission. Active Minds was not involved in the selection of the content in this promotion and does not necessarily endorse this content or agree with the advice or ideas expressed in them.
